duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee accounts payable and receivable, processing payroll, and conducting other tasks related to finance.
Track expenses, budget, taxes, cash flow, receipts, and other financial dealings of the company.
Provide regular financial reports (weekly, monthly, and yearly).
Monitor accounts payable and receivable to ensure timely processing of payroll.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting or related field (Master's preferred)
